Figure 2.27 in textbook. Might have different values for the homework. Just get formula down

	x	y	x*y	binary		Truncated	binary
10000, 10101
U: 	16	21	336	101010000	16		10000
T: 	-16	-11	176	010110000	-16		10000

10101, 01000
U:	21	8	168	010101000	8		01000
T:	-11	8	-88	110101000	8		01000

01100, 11001
U:	12	25	300	100101100	12		01100
T: 	12	-7	-84	110101100	12		01100

01010, 00101
U:	10	5	50	000110010	18		10010
T:	10	5	50	000110010	18		10010
